Our AC rooms offer premium comfort with: Our AC rooms offer premium comfort with air conditioning, spacious layout, and modern amenities. Perfect for a relaxing stay in Devgad"s tropical climate.
Our Non-AC rooms provide affordable, cle: Our Non-AC rooms provide affordable, clean stays with natural breeze and essential amenities. Ideal for budget travelers enjoying Devgad"s fresh air.
Devgad Beach is a calm, clean, and less: Devgad Beach is a calm, clean, and less crowded beach in the Konkan region, known for its golden sand and peaceful sunsets.
Vijaydurg Fort is one of the strongest s: Vijaydurg Fort is one of the strongest sea forts in India and a key part of Maratha naval history.

Kunkeshwar Temple (also known as Kunkesh: Kunkeshwar Temple (also known as Kunkeshwar Mahadev) is an ancient Shiva temple situated right next to a beautiful beach in Sindhudurg district. Often called "Konkan Kashi", the temple features intricate stone carvings and is a major pilgrimage site. The adjacent Kunkeshwar Beach adds to its serene and spiritual charm.
